metadata.title: Meditation or exercise for preventing acute respiratory infection (MEPARI-2): A randomized controlled trial

abstract.original_text: Practice of meditation or exercise may enhance health to protect against acute infectious illness.

sentences.segment_text: Practice of meditation or exercise may enhance health to protect against acute infectious illness .

abstract.original_text: To assess preventive effects of meditation and exercise on acute respiratory infection (ARI) illness.

sentences.segment_text: To assess preventive effects of meditation and exercise on acute respiratory infection ( ARI ) illness .
